version_description:
Guess what? Pure's just got swifter. 2.0.3 update has all SMS verification issues wiped out and we've also updated matching logic — everything's set up to get you hooked up tonight.

xo Pure

Guess what? Pure's just got swifter. 2.0.4 update has all SMS verification issues wiped out and we've also updated matching logic — everything's set up to get you hooked up tonight.

xo Pure

Gone is the bugging AppStore login system prompt some of you might have encountered. All should be smooth sailing right now.

xo Pure

Fixed really nasty bug causing some devices crash at the very first screen. If your experience was marred by it, please get in touch with us at feedback@getpure.org — there's a little sweet bonus waiting for you.

xo Pure

The latest update brings a series of bugfixes and performance improvements. Let us know at feedback@getpure.org if there're any issues that need to be sorted out

xo Pure

Fixed a nasty bug some of you might have experienced while chatting, thanks for reporting it! Found an issue? Let us know at feedback@getpure.org!

xo Pure

We streamlined user experience with awesome animations, also chat window opens right after your like is mutual.

A major improvement for keeping Pure's community quality top notch. Now you can report us the exact reason any user bothers you and we'll take care of it.

Pure Customer Care works directly inside the app now. Forget the emails and external messengers — get the help right where you need it.
New feature for Pure girls — if enabled, we'll let you know if a hot guy appears near you even when offline.
New feature for Pure girls — if enabled, we'll let you know when a hot guy appears near you even while offline.

Ladies, finally we took that silly toggle "want to meet me" out of the feed. Now all active chats and guys, who are waiting for your reply can be seen in "Chats".

Those of you, who don't want distractions — now you can continue chatting without goi

Now it's possible to turn off chat self-destruction timer. In the right top corner of the chat screen tap the collar icon. If your vis-à-vis is up for it, the timer will be turned off and you can talk at any time. We will assign him or her a nickname, but

We made it clear: people you see are online right now. Different time brings different people.
Check Pure more often to increase your chances to get some fun!

In the latest release we fixed some annoying bugs, improved overall flow of the app, and most importantly, we added a brand new feature — Instant chat.
We are pretty sure that you will love it! Happy hookups!

Big news — from now on Pure's free to play for everyone!
We introduced a "Free to Play" membership level, so everyone can experience Pure for free with some limitations and ads.

here we go - meet the holiday release!

- profile pic is optional now, choose from cool avatars and stay incognito
- no more copy/paste in chats
- no more photos from albums in chats and profile pics, be true or get lost
- new chat statuses
critical bug fix

Latest and much-awaited release already available:

- Now you can let others know what you are looking for. Create your personal ad and post it to the feed, where you can read and like other ads that seem appealing to you.

- We added a privat

April updates:

* Voice messages. A great way to share your mood, emotions and get more intimate with your chat partner.

* You didn't see it coming, but you can upload photos from the gallery again.

Safety tip: photos taken on camera a

• Possibility to clear chat history.
Now we added a possibility to clear chat history with your chat partner. Also, you can delete specific messages you shared: audios, photos, texts. These messages will disappear for both, you and your chat partner.

七月更新：

• 礼物

礼物功能能够帮助您在人群中脱颖而出，大方地向某人表达您对他/她的喜爱。礼物功能介绍：

在您购买礼物并发送给某人后，他/她会收到一个附有悄悄话、照片或是语音消息的礼物弹窗。如果他/她接受了礼物，那么您们将配对成功并开启对话。

• 我们改善了App内置相机的界面，自拍不再是镜面效果，同时我们还添加了自动对焦功能。

• 其他的性能优化和漏洞修复。

九月更新：

• ‘回复’选项——现在你终于可以回复聊天中特定的消息了。耶！
• 我们提升了我们的主要功能：简介推送功能。你可以在应用之间来回切换，我们的系统会自动保存你浏览的位置，这样你切换回来的时候就不用从顶部重新滑动。除此之外，所有新的简介推送都会出现在列表顶端。
• 我们添加了一个‘在线’状态筛选功能，在你查看之前对你发送喜爱的用户时，你可以一键查看当前在线的用户。
• 我们仍然在与诈骗行为作斗争，因此我们更新了我们的应用内系统，来举报和阻止不良内容。此外，我们还增加
